text: Pakistan sarkar nay online sales pe 18% GST laga diya hai.  Yeh tax har product ki sale pe lagta hai, chahay woh digital ho ya physical product.
Yeh tax seller aur buyer dono ko pay karna par sakta hai.  Aik tarah se buyer ko zyada price deni par sakti hai. Payment gateways ya courier companies tax collect kar ke government ko detay hain.
Daraz, Amazon, ya aur marketplaces pe selling karne walay sellers ko bhi yeh tax pay karna hoga. Sirf tax registered vendors hi in platforms pe sell kar saktay hain.

step_heading: Tax na denay ki penalty kya hai?
text: Agar aap tax nahin daytay tou aapko heavy fines lag saktay hain, jinka amount 5 lakh se 1 million tak ho sakta hai. Courier companies aur banks ko bhi penalties ho sakti hain.

step_heading: Aap apna business kaise protect kar saktay hain?
text: Apnay accounts ko properly maintain karein, aur tax laws ko samjh kar apna business chalayein.  Professional help lein agar zarurat ho.
